attr.title: Space Moth DX
attr.desc: Fact: everything is better with lasers. So we put lasers on over 30 angry giant insects who want to stop you, Space Moth, from escaping Earth and going to the Moon. Show them who's boss and blast your way into space!
attr.inst: Purchase at Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/425340/Space_Moth_DX/ and copy Space Moth DX.exe into the gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase at [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/425340/Space_Moth_DX/) and copy your Space Moth DX.exe into the gamedata folder.
